dict.string: search through all my web mind maps, thank you Vitor

IFS=$'\n'
echo "<?xml version='1.0'?><items>" for line in $(grep --extended-regexp '\[.+\]\(.+\)' < "research.md"); do sed -E "s|.*\[(.+)\]\((.+)\).*|<item arg='\2' valid='yes'><title>\1</title></item>|" <<< "${line}" done echo "</items>"

Big thank you to Vitor. (https://www.alfredforum.com/topic/10045-is-there-an-way-i-can-convert-a-markdown-file-of-hyperlink-into-a-script-filter-output/#comment-50546) ðŸ’š
Without whom this workflow wouldn't exist.
change hotkey to what you prefer and connect it
I prefer external trigger and I call the applescript from Karabiner
or set a word trigger if you like
